summary: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.
cast: Marlene Dietrich|Clive Brook|Anna May Wong|Warner Oland|Eugene Pallette|Lawrence Grant|Louise Closser Hale|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Emile Chautard|George Blagoi|Leonard Carey|George Chung|Wong Chung|Jack Deery|Herbert Evans|Willie Fung|Tom Gubbins|Forrester Harvey|Claude King|James B. Leong|Miki Morita|Minoru Nishida|Mrs. Sojin|Victor Wong
title: El expreso de Shanghai
